notification.content:
Dr. Mog's Mythril Stash

Dr Mog has decided to dip into his hidden Mythril stash to give away a special Daily Login Bonus!

Receive 1 Mythril every day!
Available from 5:00 AM 8/12 PST (1:00 PM 8/12 UTC) to 4:59 AM 9/11 PST(12:59 PM 9/11 UTC)

Just log in each day and the Mythril will be sent to your Item Chest!
notification.title: Dr. Mog's Mythril Stash

notification.content:
Keepsake Ribbon (VII) and Guard Stick (VII) Drop Rate Bonus!5★ Keepsake Ribbon (VII) added to Relic Draw!
Keepsake Ribbon (VII) and Guard Stick (VII) have a drop rate bonus until 4:59 PM 8/27 PST (12:59 AM 8/28 UTC)!

Keepsake Ribbon (VII)
Type: Hat
Soul Break: Planet Protector (Aerith)
Effect: Raise Attack of all allies.

Guard Stick (VII)
Type: Rod
Soul Break: Healing Wind (Aerith)
Effect: Restore HP to all allies.

The Relic Synergy from FINAL FANTASY VII equipment will give your party a leg up during the ongoing Footsteps of the Cetra event!
Use the Planet Protector and Healing Wind Soul Breaks to blaze a path to victory in the Footsteps of the Cetra event!

FINAL FANTASY VII Shared Soul Break Equipment Added! 5★ Crystal Sword (VII) has a Shared Soul Break!

Crystal Sword (VII)
Type: Sword
Soul Break: Double Thunder Cut
Effect: Deal 2 lightning attacks in a row.

5★ FINAL FANTASY VII Equipment Drop Rate Bonus!Bonus drop rate for Wizard Bracelet (VII) - Shared Soul Break, Gold Armlet (VII) - Shared Soul Break, Adamant Bangle (VII), and Butterfly Edge (VII)!

Use the Relic Synergies from FF VII equipment to power your way through the ongoing Footsteps of the Cetra event!
notification.title: New Relic Draw Drops

notification.content:
Bonus Battles in Lightning Strikes! Bonus Battles have been added to the ongoing Lightning Strikes event!
The ++ event boss has 50% resistance to break effects.
The boss is vulnerable to ice, so come prepared with ice magic and abilities, and have Protectga and Shellga ready to lessen the incoming damage!

Unlock Bonus Battles by completing all of the event Elite Dungeons.
Survive the gauntlet of boss battles to get the new Break Strike ability!

See Event Rules for more details.
notification.title: Bonus Battles Added

notification.content:
Thank you for playing FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper.
We have addressed an issue regarding Today Widget on iOS8.

Issue details: An issue has been discovered relating to Today Widget, which does not work properly for players using iOS 8 after updating to the latest version of this App.
More specifically, the time of the next Free Relic Draw and the current Stamina are not displayed correctly.
If you are using Today Widget, please wait before updating to the latest version of this App.

The issue is being investigated and we will let you know once a solution has been found.


We hope you continue to enjoy FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper.
notification.title: (Investigating) Today Widget issue

notification.content:
Thank you for playing FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper.
We have resolved an issue relating to the "Win a Cloud figure signed by Tetsuya Nomura" campaign page.

Issue details: Some players were unable to view the campaign page after tapping the "Special" button on the Choose Realm screen.
The issue has now been resolved and the page will be correctly displayed for all players.
Tap the "Special" button from the Choose Realm screen, then "Enter" to accept the quest. Players who have already fulfilled the quest requirements will complete the quest immediately upon accepting it. Once the quest has been completed, you will be entered into the prize campaign.
Thank you for your patience while we were working to fix the issue.

We hope you continue to enjoy FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper.
notification.title: (Issue Resolved) Prize Campaign Screen

notification.content:
Thank you for your patience!
The latest update is complete as of 4:00 AM 8/10 PST (12:00 PM 8/10 UTC)!
The following features have been changed or added.

Soul Break Mastery -Characters now earn Mastery points when battling in equipment with Unique Soul Breaks they can use. When the Unique Soul Break’s Mastery bar is full, the character has mastered the Soul Break.
-Once a Soul Break has been mastered, the character can still use the Soul Break even without the corresponding piece of equipment.
*Shared Soul Breaks and the Unique Soul Breaks of other characters cannot be mastered.

Bring 4 Soul Breaks into Battle -Characters can now choose from up to 4 available Soul Breaks to use during battle. You can assign these Soul Breaks from the Camp Screen, even while in a dungeon.
*Assigned Soul Breaks must be chosen from the character’s Default Soul Break, Mastered Soul Breaks, and Soul Breaks on current equipment.

Remove All -The main Party Screen now has a “Remove All” command.
-Remove All allows you to remove all equipment, abilities, or Record Materia at once.
-You can choose to Remove All from characters in the current party, or characters outside the current party.
-You can choose to remove only a single category at a time (equipment, abilities, or Record Materia).

Enemy HP Display -Enemy HP is now displayed in all dungeons.

Toggle AUTO Battle Always On -You can now set AUTO Battle to ON to always begin battle in AUTO Battle mode, so you don’t have to manually turn it on at the beginning of each battle.

Character Skip Settings -You can now choose two different ways to skip between characters’ turns in battle.
-ATB Order: Skipping the current character passes the active turn to the next character in the order in which their ATB gauges reached full.
-Party Order: Skipping the current character passes the active turn to the topmost character in the party with a full ATB gauge.

Increased Inventory -The equipment inventory can now be expanded up to a maximum of 500 slots.
*The number of ability slots has not changed.

We hope you enjoy the new and improved FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper!
notification.title: Major Update!

notification.content:
The next part of our update celebration is here!
FINAL FANTASY awaits: Win a PlayStation® 4!

Campaign Info
For a chance to win a PlayStation® 4, all you need to do is complete the Special Quest to beat Mako Reactor No. 5 Classic FF VII, then apply in-game!

Campaign Duration
10:00 AM 8/14 PST (6:00 PM 8/14 UTC) to 11:59 PM 8/31 PST (8:00 AM 9/1UTC)
See the website for details!
Campaign URL:
http://ffawaits.finalfantasyrecordkeeper.com/
notification.title: FINAL FANTASY awaits: Win a PlayStation® 4!
notification.list_title: FINAL FANTASY awaits: Win a PlayStation® 4!

notification.content:
Thank you for playing FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper.
We have addressed an issue relating to Lightning's Record Materia, Flash of Light.

Issue details: The description of Flash of Light originally stated "Begin battle with a full ATB gauge." but the correct description is "Sometimes begin battle with a full ATB gauge."

The description has now been corrected.

We hope you continue to enjoy FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper.
notification.title: (Issue Resolved) Flash of Light Description

notification.content:
We’ve taken a look at the power level of some existing characters and decided they needed rebalancing to be more competitive. The following characters have had improvements made to their available abilities, equipment, and/or stats:

-Celes
-Raised useable Black Magic abilities from 2★ to 3★.
-Can now use 3★ Combat abilities.
-Increased HP, Attack (ATK), and Defense (DEF).
-Cyan
-Can now equip regular armor.
-Increased Attack (ATK).
-Snow
-Increased Attack (ATK).
-Squall
-Raised useable Spellblade abilities from 3★ to 4★.
-Can now use 3★ Celerity abilities.
-Vanille
-Can now use 3★ Summoning abilities.

We hope you continue to enjoy FINAL FANTASY Record Keeper!
notification.title: Balance Changes

notification.content:
5★Blazefire Saber (XIII), 5★Vega 42s (XIII), 5★Keepsake Knife (XIII), and 5★Sanctum Gloves (XIII) added to Relic Draw.
5★ Blazefire Saber (XIII) and 5★ Vega 42s (XIII) have a drop rate bonus through 4:59 PM 8/20 PST (12:59 AM 8/21 UTC)!

Blazefire Saber (XIII)
Type: Sword
Soul Break: Blaze Rush (Lightning)
Effect: Deal 3 consecutive non-elemental attacks.

Vega 42s (XIII)
Type: Gun
Soul Break: Boon (Sazh)
Effect: Give Shell and Haste to all allies.

The Relic Synergy from FF XIII equipment can be a big help in the ongoing Lightning Strikes event!
Devastate powerful foes with the Blaze Rush and Boon Soul Breaks!

FINAL FANTASY XIII Shared Soul Break equipment added!5★ Keepsake Knife (XIII) and 5★ Sanctum Gloves have Shared Soul Breaks!

Keepsake Knife (XIII)
Type: Dagger
Soul Break: Veil of Protection
Effect: Give Protect to all allies.

Sanctum Gloves (XIII)
Type: Bracer
Soul Break: Power Sigil
Effect: Deal non-elemental magic damage to one target.

5★ FINAL FANTASY XIII Equipment Drop Rate Bonus!Bonus drop rate for Keepsake Knife (XIII), Sanctum Gloves (XIII), Hunter’s Rod (XIII), Kaiser Knuckles (XIII), and Gold Bangle (XIII)!

Use the Relic Synergies from FF XIII equipment to conquer the ongoing Lightning Strikes event!
notification.title: New Relic Draw Drops

notification.content:
Recruit Lightning, former Guardian Corps soldier! Lightning Strikes challenge event launched at 5:00 PM 8/10 PST (1:00 AM 8/11 UTC).

Duration 5:00 PM 8/10 PST (1:00 AM 8/11 UTC) to 4:59 PM 8/20 PST (12:59 AM 8/21 UTC)

Event Boss The last boss for the Classic and Elite event dungeons has 50% resistance to break effects.
Use abilities like Boost to raise your Attack, and Protectga and Shellga to lessen incoming damage.

Rewards Recruit Lightning and Sazh!
Complete the Elite Dungeons to get Lightning and Sazh Memory Crystals.
Use Lightning and Sazh’s Memory Crystals to break their level caps!

notification.content:
New Dungeons Added! New dungeons are available as of 5:00 PM 8/13 PST (1:00 AM 8/14 UTC)!
New classic and elite dungeons have been added!
Relive epic battles and unforgettable moments from FINAL FANTASY!

New Dungeons Await! Experience new adventures from the realms of FF II, FF V, and FF IX! Venture forth with Maria and Steiner in your party!


New Record Materia! This update includes the following new Record Materia:
-Warrior of Light: Crystals’ Blessing
Gain Shell when HP drops too low.
-Warrior of Light: Light’s Wrath
Change Attack to a holy attack.
-Gordon: Grim Determination
Gain increasing Resistance as HP drops.
-Gordon: Pride of Kashuan
Begin battle with Protect.
Select Party -> Party Members -> Record Materia to see how to unlock them!

Recruit Cecil With Bonus Quests! Two new bonus quests added!
-Complete Fabul Castle Elite.
-Complete Baron Castle Elite.
Completing these quests to recruit both the Paladin and the Dark Knight versions of Cecil!


Next Update in late August! New dungeons and adventures will be released about twice per month.
The next release is scheduled to coincide with the next event in late August!
notification.title: New Dungeons Added!

notification.content:
To celebrate the recent update, we're holding an exciting new campaign!
Win a Cloud Figure signed by Tetsuya Nomura!

Campaign Info

All you need to do is complete the Special Quest to beat Mako Reactor No. 1 Classic FF VII, then apply in-game for a chance to win!

Campaign Duration
10:00 AM 8/11 PST (6:00 PM 8/11 UTC) to 11:59 PM 8/31 PST (8:00 AM 9/1UTC)
See the website for details!

http://cloudfigure.finalfantasyrecordkeeper.com/
notification.title: Win a Cloud Figure signed by Tetsuya Nomura!
notification.list_title: Win a Cloud Figure signed by Tetsuya Nomura!

notification.content:
This is an important notice for players of SQUARE ENIX games on the iOS platform.

Apple has officially announced the release of its iOS 9 Beta. Please note that if you install the iOS 9 Beta on your device, SQUARE ENIX apps may encounter malfunctions such as performance errors or loss of data, or perhaps even fail to deliver in-game currency purchased with real money.

Since our apps are not compatible with the iOS 9 Beta at this time, we regret we are unable to provide customer support for any trouble arising from installation of this OS (including, but not limited to, data recovery or undelivered in-game currencies). Please be aware that SQUARE ENIX will not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, in any way for loss or damages of any kind incurred by installing or using the iOS 9 Beta with relation to SQUARE ENIX apps.

For further information, please also see Apple's "Frequently Asked Questions."
https://beta.apple.com/sp/en/betaprogram/faq
notification.title: Apple iOS 9 Beta Notice
